name: p7d-markdown-it-p-captions
description: adds p[class|=caption] in markdown preview html.

p7dMarkdownItPCaptions.notConvertLabelJo.description: Not convert full-width space of label joint display to half-width space.

p7dMarkdownItPCaptions.classPrefix.description: Prefix for caption class names. Leave empty to use the default.

p7dMarkdownItPCaptions.hasNumClass.description: Add label-has-num class when a caption label contains a number.

p7dMarkdownItPCaptions.bLabel.description: Use a b element for caption labels.

p7dMarkdownItPCaptions.strongLabel.description: Use a strong element for caption labels.

p7dMarkdownItPCaptions.labelPrefixMarker.description: Allow marker(s) before the label. Use a comma-separated list.

p7dMarkdownItPCaptions.removeUnnumberedL.description: Comma-separated marks to keep unnumbered labels for. Default keeps blockquote; add no-blockquote (or unblockquote) to remove it.

p7dMarkdownItPCaptions.removeMarkNameInC.description: Remove mark names from label/body span class names.

p7dMarkdownItPCaptions.wrapCaptionBody.description: Wrap caption body text in a span element.

p7dMarkdownItPCaptions.setFigureNumber.description: Automatically number figure and table captions without explicit numbers.
